    In meeting video controller

    • Method Detail

      • activeVideoUserID

        long activeVideoUserID()
        This method is used to get active video user id in the meeting.
        Returns:
        active video user id.

      • isMyVideoMuted

        boolean isMyVideoMuted()
        This method is used to check my video is muted or not.
        Returns:
        true, my video is muted.

      • canUnmuteMyVideo

        boolean canUnmuteMyVideo()
        This method is used to check user can unmute self video or not.
        Returns:
        true means that can unmute.

      • muteMyVideo

        MobileRTCSDKError muteMyVideo(boolean mute)
        This method is used to mute/unmute video
        Parameters:
        mute, - true means to mute video, false means to unmute
        Returns:
        Api call error defined in MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success

      • rotateMyVideo

        boolean rotateMyVideo(int rotation)
        This method is used to rotate my video
        Parameters:
        rotation, - 0:0 degree rotation (natural orientation); 1:90 degree rotation; 2:180 degree rotation; 3:270 degree rotation.
        Returns:
        api call is success or not

      • canSwitchCamera

        boolean canSwitchCamera()
        Check if it can switch camera now
        Returns:
        can switch or not

      • switchToNextCamera

        boolean switchToNextCamera()
        Switch to next camera
        Returns:
        return true if api call success

      • switchCamera

        boolean switchCamera(java.lang.String cameraId)
        Switch to camera by Id
        Parameters:
        cameraId, - the id of the camera refer to CameraDevice
        Returns:
        return true if api call success

      • getCameraDeviceList

        Get all camera devices
        Returns:

        Check the camera id is front camera or not
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        return true if it is front camera

      • isBackCamera

        boolean isBackCamera(java.lang.String cameraId)
        Check the camera id is back camera or not
        Parameters:
        cameraId, - the id of the camera refer to CameraDevice
        Returns:
        return true if it is back camera

      • stopAttendeeVideo

        MobileRTCSDKError stopAttendeeVideo(long userId)
        This method is used for host to mute the user's video
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call error defined in MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success

      • askAttendeeStartVideo

        MobileRTCSDKError askAttendeeStartVideo(long userId)
        This method is used for host to adk the user to start video
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call error defined in MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success

      • isUserVideoSpotLighted

        boolean isUserVideoSpotLighted(long userId)
        This method is used to check the user's video spotlighted or not.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        return true if user's video spotlighted

      • spotLightVideo

        MobileRTCSDKError spotLightVideo(boolean on,
                                 long userId)
        This method is used to spotlight the user's video or not.
        Parameters:
        on, - if true to spotlight user's video; if NO to cancel spotlight user's video.
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call error defined in MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success

      • getPinnedUser

        long getPinnedUser()
        This method is used to get current pinned video user's id
        Returns:
        userId, the user id in meeting.

      • isUserPinned

        boolean isUserPinned(long userId)
        This method is used to check the user's video pinned or not.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        return true if user's video pinned

      • pinVideo

        MobileRTCSDKError pinVideo(boolean on,
                           long userId)
        This method is used to pin the user's video or not.
        Parameters:
        on, - if true to pin user's video; if NO to cancel pin user's video.
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call error defined in MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success
